result.execSummary:
The defendant Caleb Michael Mormon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments, Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant to report to Probation no later than August 21, 2015 by 4:00 p.m.
Court notes 11 days credit if revoked.
Defendant may apply for expungement upon successful completion of Probation.
Court dismisses 15CM244 and 15CM465.


In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
$243.00 to be collected by DOC as a condition of probation in Count 1 Case #15CM351.
$200.00 DNA surcharge to be collected by DOC as a condition of probation in Count 1 Case #15CM351.

-Defendant to provide a DNA sample.
-NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with Trina Hoglund.
-Complete Domestic Abuse Assessment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Caleb Michael Mormon

records.addlTxt: From Probation Agent Gelderman requesting copies of Criminal Complaints. Faxed requested documents. hml

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Reason for Change: Terminated - Regular.          Restitution = $0.00, Court Obs = $0.00 and Supv fees = $40.00. eif

records.addlTxt: Signed by Def and Atty. km
c: Def, Atty, DA, NRPD & E: Probation. eif
signed by Def & Atty this date. fax: Atty Christiansen. eif
filed by Atty Christiansen regarding schedule conflict. eif

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  Trina H.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

TO ALSO INCLUDE 15CM351,15CM465 and 15CM244:
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  Katie J. Christiansen   DF:  Caleb Michael Mormon appeared from jail. Case called at 1:38 p.m.  ADA McKinley gives recommendations. State has complied with victims rights. If defendant successfully completes probation, may apply for expungement. Atty Christiansen is in agreement. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads GUILTY to Ct's 1 and 2  in 15CM351. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct's 1 and 2 in 15CM351. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses cases 15CM465 and 15CM244 . Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:

- S/W 1 year of probation. If probation is revoked, 11 days jail credit. Sign up for probation by no later than 4:00 p.m., Friday August, 21, 2015. Discharge from bond and convert to signature bond

- Court costs and DNA Surcharge. To be paid during the term of probation. 

- Provide DNA Sample

-  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Trina Hoglund.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Complete domestic abuse assessment

- May apply for expungement if successfully completes probation

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.
filed by Atty. K. Christiansen. gme

Includes 15CM351 and 15CM465

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, T. Hoglund.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Minot. ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton   DF:  Caleb Michael Mormon appeared from jail. Includes 15CM465 and 15CM351. Case called at 1:14 pm. Address confirmed. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG each count.  Speedy Trail Reserved. ADA McKinley makes bond recommends $1,000.00 CBS. Atty Caton responds. Court orders $1,000.00 CBS on both files. km  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
